features.title: Why InvestWise?
features.subtitle: We provide the tools and resources you need to succeed in the market.

performance.title: Performance Tracking
performance.description: Track your portfolio's performance in real-time with detailed analytics and insights.

security.title: Secure Investments
security.description: Your investments are protected with top-tier security measures for your peace of mind.

community.title: Community Support
community.description: Join our vibrant investor community to share ideas, learn from experts, and stay informed.

investment.title: Investment Opportunities
investment.subtitle: Explore our wide range of portfolio options across various risk levels and sectors. Achieve your financial goals with investment instruments analyzed by our expert team.

real_estate.title: Real Estate Fund
real_estate.description: Invest in high-yield real estate portfolio.

tech.title: Technology Growth Portfolio
tech.description: Benefit from the growth of leading technology companies with our carefully curated portfolio.

sustainable.title: Sustainable Living Investments
sustainable.description: Sustainable investment option supporting environmentally friendly ventures and companies.

learn.title: Learn
learn.subtitle: Acquire the knowledge and skills necessary to succeed in the investment world. Develop yourself with comprehensive educational materials prepared by our expert instructors.

basic.title: Basic Investment Education
basic.description: Take your first step into the investment world. Learn basic concepts, risk management, and portfolio creation.

advanced.title: Advanced Strategies
advanced.description: Advanced analysis techniques and strategy development for experienced investors.

market.title: Market Updates
market.description: Current market analysis, economic indicators, and expert opinions.

community.title: Community
community.subtitle: Join our community of thousands of investors. Share your experiences, learn from experts, and achieve success together.

forums.title: Discussion Forums
forums.description: Active forum areas for investment strategies, market analysis, and experience sharing.

events.title: Expert Events
events.description: Webinar, seminar, and workshop events organized with expert speakers in their fields.

support.title: Support
support.subtitle: Our 24/7 customer support team is always with you. We answer your questions, help with technical issues, and guide you in your investment decisions.

phone.title: Phone Support
phone.description: 24/7 phone support line you can reach

live_chat.title: Live Chat
live_chat.description: Live chat support where you can get instant responses

email.title: Email Support
email.description: Email support for your detailed questions

account.question: How does the account opening process work?
account.answer: Your account becomes active within 24 hours with identity verification.

min_investment.question: What is the minimum investment amount?
min_investment.answer: You can start investing with a minimum of $500 for beginners.

withdrawal.question: How long does the withdrawal process take?
withdrawal.answer: Withdrawal requests are transferred to your account within 1-3 business days.

advisory.question: Is there an investment advisory service?
advisory.answer: Yes, you can request a free consultation from our expert advisors.

live_market.title: Live Market Data
live_market.subtitle: Real-time prices and current investment opportunities
